c74object.name: cage.freqshift
c74object.digest: Transpose scores linearly in the frequency domain
c74object.description: Performs a symbolic frequency shift, i.e. transposes a bach.roll or bach.score linearly in the frequency domain.

inlet.digest: Shift amount in Hertz (fixed or lambda)

objarg.name: shift
objarg.description: The optional argument sets the initial shift in Hertz (defaults to 0).

method.name: bang
method.description: Outputs result of the last frequency shift.

method.name: float
method.description: Any number in the right inlet sets the shift amount in Hertz. If a lambda loop is in place, the shift is expected to be given for every incoming onset. The lambda loop will receive an onset (in milliseconds) and output the corresponding shift in Hertz.

method.name: llll
method.description: An llll in the inlet is considered as the roll or score gathered syntax. The transposition operation is performed linearly in the frequency domain, and the transposed roll or score in gathered syntax is output through the outlet. The output header content is the same as the input header content. The amount of transposition is set via the right inlet (defaults to 0 Hz), and an llll in such inlet is converted into a float.

attribute.name: diapason
attribute.description: Sets the tuning for the reference diapason A. Defaults to 440.

attribute.name: normalize
attribute.description: Toggles the ability to normalize the time coordinate between 0 (beginninng of score) and 1 (end of score).

attribute.name: tails
attribute.description: Toggles the ability to also process tails for notes without breakpoints

entry.name: Inlet 2 (float)
entry.description: Shift amount in Hertz (fixed or lambda).
